title: Rosemary-Maple Dijon Spread
description: A bright, lightly sweet, herb-forward spread that pairs perfectly with lemon-rosemary chicken, Brie, and thin apple slices on focaccia. Designed to balance richness while keeping calories reasonable.
ingredients: 2 tbsp light mayo or Greek yogurt (Greek = higher protein)
1â€“1.5 tsp lemon juice (depending on acidity preference)
1/2 tsp finely chopped fresh rosemary (or 1/4 tsp dried rosemary)
1 small garlic clove, grated (or 1/4 tsp garlic powder)
instructions: In a small bowl, combine Dijon, mayo or Greek yogurt, maple syrup, and lemon juice.
Stir in the rosemary, garlic, salt, and pepper.
Whisk until smooth and fully blended.
Taste and adjust: add more lemon for brightness or maple for sweetness.
Use immediately or refrigerate for up to 5 days.
notes: Pairs best with lemon-rosemary chicken, Brie, and crisp thin apple slices on focaccia. Greek yogurt version adds extra protein and keeps calories lower.
